arts.ttl: Lecce vs. Venezia, fight for survival
arts.sum: Lecce are unbeaten in five games against Venezia in Serie A (W3 D2), while only against Monza (six) have they played more matches without losing in the top flight. Venezia have won just three of their first 30 games in a Serie A season for only the second time in the competition, after 2001/02, when they also lost their 31st match of that campaign.

arts.ttl: Preview: Lecce vs. Venezia - prediction, team news, lineups
